skills.title: Database Design

portfolio.title: The Learning Lab
portfolio.description: Gamified web application for K-12 students and educators. Features include fully functioning Login system with user authentication/authorization, course creation, student enrollment, and game scoreboard for teachers, and two demo Unity games for students to play.
portfolio.tech: Tech: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, HTML, CSS, SQL, MySQL, Unity WebGL

portfolio.title: Colibrarian Library Management System
portfolio.description: Java GUI application for library users to add a new book to the database, search the database for existing books, and export book data into a JSON file.
portfolio.tech: Tech: Java Swing, SQL, MySQL, Gson

portfolio.title: Binary Search Tree with Duplicates Project
portfolio.description: Console application that implements a generic binary search tree that handles duplicate elements by storing a HashMap in each node (key is the item and value is the number of times that item is stored). Features include inserting elements, removing elements, viewing element count, checking if an element exists, and viewing the binary search tree.
